text: Ara yakhana tadera ke bala haya, ‘allah‌ ya nayila karechena tate imana ano’,tara bale ‘amadera prati ya nayila hayeche amara kebala tate imana ani’. Athaca era ba'ire ya kichu ache sabakichu'i tara asbikara kare, yadi'o ta satya ebam tadera nikata ya ache tara satyayanakari. Baluna, ‘yadi tomara mumina haye thaka, tabe kena tomara atite allah‌ra nabiderake hatya karechile [1]?’
